<h1><span class="ds-u-font-size--h1 ds-u-font-weight--normal ds-u-leading--heading">COVID-19 Vaccine Resources</span></h1>
</div>
</div>

<div class="ds-l-row">
<div class="ds-u-margin-bottom--2 ds-l-col--12 ds-l-lg-col--8"><img alt="icon of the COVID-19 vaccine" src="/files/image/omh-covid-vaccine424x232.jpg" width="424" /></div>

<div class="ds-u-margin-bottom--2 ds-l-col--12 ds-l-lg-col--4">
<p>The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Office of Minority Health (CMS OMH) has compiled the following federal resources on the COVID-19 vaccine for health care professionals, partners and patients. We have also prepared a list of resources in other languages. Please share these materials, bookmark the page, and check back often for the most up-to-date information.</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="ds-l-row">
<div class="ds-l-col--12">
<p class="ds-u-fill--gray-lightest ds-u-padding--5 ds-u-margin-bottom--3"><span><span><span><span>For a complete and updated list of CMS actions, and other information specific to CMS, please visit the <a href="/About-CMS/Agency-Information/Emergency/EPRO/Current-Emergencies/Current-Emergencies-page">Current Emergencies Website</a>. Visit our general COVID-19 webpage for COVID-19 federal resources focusing on populations that have an increased risk of COVID-19:<a href="/About-CMS/Agency-Information/OMH/resource-center/COVID-19-Resources"> go.cms.gov/omhcovid19</a> and C2C COVID-19 webpage:<a href="/About-CMS/Agency-Information/OMH/equity-initiatives/c2c/consumerresources/c2c-covid-19-resources"> go.cms.gov/c2ccovid19</a>. For more federal information on the current COVID-19 vaccines, see the full list of <a href="https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/index.html">CDC COVID-19 Vaccine resources and outreach materials</a> and <a href="https://www.fda.gov/emergency-preparedness-and-response/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/covid-19-vaccines#authorized-vaccines">FDA COVID-19 vaccine updates</a>. </span></span></span></span><br /><br /><span><span><span><span>Help increase confidence in COVID-19 vaccines by sharing resources from <a href="https://wecandothis.hhs.gov/">HHS’s “We Can Do This” COVID-19 Vaccine Public Education Campaign. </a></span></span></span></span></p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="ds-l-lg-column--12 ds-u-margin-top--3">

readabilityObject.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Resources | CMS
readabilityObject.content: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Office of Minority Health (CMS OMH) has compiled the following federal resources on the COVID-19 vaccine for health care professionals, partners and patients. We have also prepared a list of resources in other languages. Please share these materials, bookmark the page, and check back often for the most up-to-date information.
readabilityObject.textContent: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Office of Minority Health (CMS OMH) has compiled the following federal resources on the COVID-19 vaccine for health care professionals, partners and patients. We have also prepared a list of resources in other languages. Please share these materials, bookmark the page, and check back often for the most up-to-date information.
